text:
Since both Xand Φ are independent of the parameters θthat we wish to
optimize, we arrive immediately at the maximum likelihood estimatemaximum likelihood
estimate
θML = (Φ⊤Φ)−1Φ⊤y (9.19)
for the linear regression problem with nonlinear features deﬁned in (9.13).
Remark. When we were working without features, we required X⊤Xto
